title: The Mosquito
description: Mosquitoes are flying insects known for their role as vectors of diseases and their blood-feeding habits in females. Only female mosquitoes bite and require blood for egg development.

questions.question: Which gender of mosquito typically bites humans and animals?
What do male mosquitoes primarily feed on?
How many species of mosquitoes exist worldwide?
Why do mosquitoes breed in standing water?
options: They hide from predators in water

questions.question: What sense do mosquitoes use to find their hosts?
